data.title: Bitcoin ($BTC) Is Likely Going to Keep ‘Outperforming Gold, Stock Market', Says Bloomberg Analyst
data.text: Bloomberg commodity strategist Mike McGlone has weighed in on Bitcoin's performance as inflation surges, interest rates rise, and Ukraine deals with a large-scale invasion from Russia. In a tweet shared with his followers on social media, McGlone noted that this year may be “primed for risk-asset reversion and mark another milestone in Bitcoin's maturation.” The […]

data.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Hold Steady Amid Dollar Weakness But Are Altcoins The Ones Presenting 'Opportunities' Right Now?
data.text: Bitcoin traded flat over 24 hours as the global cryptocurrency market cap inched up 0.4% to $1.9 trillion.
